document_data.name: Durinbold Cheese
document_data.mainbody: '''Durinbold cheese''' was a type of [[sheep]]'s [[milk]] [[cheese]] found in the [[Western Heartlands]] and the [[Sword Coast North]] regions of [[Faer√ªn]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The [[Durinbold]] family's cheese was distinctly flavored. This creamy cheese had a [[nut]]ty taste and was soaked in [[honey]]. It was preserved by being wrapped in [[chestnut]] leaves and was cut into wedges when sold.
